name: Tycoon
description:
A hyper-unrealistic simulation of business that's full of cubes. So many cubes.

Go for the big bucks, avoid skulls, and defeat your fellow tycoons. Collect cubes through your green bin on the left. Click on cubes to blow them up and force other cubes to move. Collect money to win. Avoid skulls to avoid death. Collect power cubes too, because you need power to make moves, but you’re constantly running out.

This game was made in under 48 hours as part of the Ludum Dare competition #39 on July 28-30, 2017. The competition entry page is here.
